item.title: Network Medicine Framework for Identifying Drug Repurposing Opportunities for COVID-19
Network Medicine Framework for Identifying Drug Repurposing Opportunities for COVID-19
Co-expression differential network analysis: CoDiNA
item.description: XXIX International Biometric Conference Background Biological networks can be represented and analyzed using systems biology; Gene co-expression networks have been particularly helpful (Barabasi and Oltvai (2004), Bansal et al. (2007), Furlong (2013), Dempsey et al. (2013)) to the understanding of how factors interact. In such networks, nodes represent genes and a weighted link between a pair of genes is often a correlation, where the sign suggests an up- or down-regulation of one factor by another (Dam et al.
